panels.visual: Visual: Lightsword stands at the grove's edge, Pip on shoulder, Darkstorm at side. They pull out FOUR cards - all glowing gold. Determination on their face. Characters: Lightsword, Pip, Darkstorm
panels.dialogue: Lightsword: "All or nothing." (Caption): "Bless. Turn Undead. Smite. Healing Light."

characters.Lightsword: A glowing, indeterminate humanoid figure wrapped in soft golden-white light No defined species - ethereal and mysterious Wearing simple ceremonial robes over the glowing form

panels.visual: Visual: SMITE on the chains - they CRACK but hold! (Rolled a 2!) Lightsword strains, pouring more power. Characters: Lightsword, Starwind
